description: Handling Chrome Dev Tools: Debugging, Running line breaks with breakpoints, Run overrides on the fly, Run snippets, Work with the console, Work with Browser Memories (LS, SS, Cookies)
Modern Syntax ES6: Arrow functions, Template Strings, Ternary Operator, Objects destructuring, Spread Operator, Modules imports, Fetch API

Advanced concepts: How the JS engine works (Chromium V8), Call Stack, Memory Heap, Web API, Callback Queue, Garbage Collector, Closures, Hoisting, Prototype, Execution Context, Modules, Synchronous and Asynchronous execution

Framework fundamentals for SPA development: Virtual DOM, JSX, fragments, Class and Functional Components, imports and exports, Hooks (useState, useEffect, useContext), props, proptypes, npm packages installation
Handle the CSS styles with frameworks (Material UI, Chakra UI, Tailwind UI, Bootstrap)
